title: Safeguarding Critical Minerals for the Energy Transition
description: The United States needs a broader view of the challenges and opportunities involved with critical minerals—and a comprehensive strategy to deal with both.

title: Update on North Korean Human Rights on the First Anniversary of the Biden Inauguration
description: Ambassador Robert King provides an update on the status of North Korean human rights on the first anniversary of President Joe Biden’s inauguration.

title: Why is South Korea Hesitant to Boycott the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics?
description: South Korean President Moon Jae-in’s visit to Australia on December 12-15, 2021, revealed a vast discrepancy in Seoul and Canberra’s strategy against the intensifying U.S.-China competition

title: U.S.-India Insight: 2022: Expected Inflection Points in U.S.-India Ties
description: It is difficult to remember a quiet, calm year in U.S.-India relations. The relationship is replete with areas of congruence and conflict, so inflection points are common. This year will likely be no different.

title: The Mirage of the Metaverse
description: With Facebook's rebranding as Meta and their substantial investment on developing the metaverse, companies around the world have been rushing to get a foothold on what's theorized to be the new Internet. But what exactly is the metaverse? Will it help with the problems...

title: The Legacy of Bayh-Dole's Success on U.S. Global Competitiveness Today
description: Widely considered to be one of the most important pieces of legislation for American innovators and inventors, the Patent and Trademark Law Amendments Act of 1980 -better known as the Bayh-Dole Act- played a key role in renewing American innovation policy in response to the...

title: When Elephants Fight in Outer Space
description: Failing to observe norms of behavior for outer space activities and debris mitigation weakens the prosperity and security of space for future generations.

title: Can the OSCE Help Resolve the Russia-Ukraine Crisis?
description: As Russia makes demands for an uncontested sphere of influence in Eastern Europe, can the OSCE help protect the fundamental principles of European security and prevent a renewed invasion of Ukraine?

title: Getting the Pandemic Completely Wrong
description: Dr. Jon Alterman discusses the Covid-19 pandemic’s surprising lack of impact on governments in the Middle East.

title: Morocco's Sand Mafias
description: Unregulated sand mining in Morocco is fueling construction of new tourism developments, but it's also threatening the very coastline on which those developments rely.

title: A Stealth Industry: The Quiet Expansion of Chinese Private Security Companies
description: With estimates suggesting as many as 20 to 40 Chinese private security companies (PSCs) operating abroad in some 40 countries, PSCs are a well-positioned tool for the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) to project power abroad.

title: Fireside Chat with Dr. Anthony Fauci: Is the Pandemic in Transition?
description: Please join the CSIS Commission on Strengthening America’s Health Security for a fireside chat with Dr. Anthony Fauci on what Omicron might mean in the larger picture of the pandemic and the future, at home and abroad.
